thread.title: See Pics: SRK boards the train for Delhi amidst a throng of fans at the station!
thread.title_full: See Pics: SRK boards the train for Delhi amidst a throng of fans at the station!

author: Ankita Bhalla
title: See Pics: SRK boards the train for Delhi amidst a throng of fans at the station!
text: January 23, 2017 Ankita Bhalla 4740 reads 2 comments + 8 Photos Shah Rukh Khan always comes up with unique possible ways to promote his films. As Raees is all set to hit the theatres in two days time, Khan has embarked on a train journey to his favourite place, Delhi. Accompanied by media persons and film's producer Ritesh Sidhwani, Khan today boarded the August Kranti Rajdhani Express from Andheri station, Mumbai. And that was no easy feat, considering the humongous crowd gathered at the station to catch a glimpse of their beloved King Khan. Fans were busy clicking pictures, while the police personnels had a tough time helping SRK board the train. Khan, in his signature wave, addressed his fans, before beginning his interesting journey. Raees will release on January 25, 2017, and stars Mahira Khan alongside SRK in the film.
